Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Sedgwick
ShortDescription: 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Orleans, Clybourn, Larrabee, North Avenue and Sedgwick: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Sedgwick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Orleans, Clybourn, Larrabee, North Avenue, Sedgwick and over regular route, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Sedgwick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line Service Delayed  at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick rider. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick rider. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
